synopsis.text:
OTwins/OTeacher crew embarks on a summer adventure as Maiku seeks solace from the chaos of his life in the tranquility of the woods. With Karen clinging to him and Miina craving attention, Maiku sets up a camp to focus on his work. However, their summer takes an unexpected turn when Morino organizes a field trip to Maiku's camp, inviting everyone to create unforgettable memories.

As various couples find their pairings, Miina sees this as an opportunity to confess her feelings to Maiku. But will Karen's interference prevent her from doing so? Meanwhile, rumors of a female ghost haunting the lake add a supernatural twist to their vacation, and Ichigo's mysterious hidden cameras raise suspicions.

Will Matagu finally find love amidst the romantic entanglements? Will Miina get her chance with Maiku, or will Karen's possessiveness continue to interfere? And what secrets does the supposedly haunted forest hold for our heroes? Join the OTwins/OTeacher crew as they navigate love, friendship, and mystery in this exciting summer escapade.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
